activatePracticeModeModal.disableLearnin:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the modal to disable Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track menu → Activate Practice Mode modal (heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to activate Practice Mode from the track menu
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Disable Learning Mode"
activatePracticeModeModal.paragraph1:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains the consequences of disabling Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track menu → Activate Practice Mode modal (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the Activate Practice Mode modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Disabling Learning Mode will unlock all the Practice Exercises on this track, but will disable Concepts and Learning Exercises."
activatePracticeModeModal.warning:
**Functional Purpose**: Informs the user that they can switch modes at any time
**UI Location**: Track menu → Activate Practice Mode modal (warning message)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the Activate Practice Mode modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You can switch in and out of Practice Mode at any time."
activatePracticeModeModal.disableLearnin:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm disabling Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track menu → Activate Practice Mode modal (primary button)
**When Users See This**: When a user is presented with the option to disable Learning Mode
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Disable Learning Mode"
